description: Legal AI Agent Policy Rulebook ‚Äî multi-practice-area, enforced at runtime by ArmorIQ PolicyEngine

research_agent.scope_description: Read-only legal research. Cannot communicate externally, draft documents, or make legal decisions.

ethical_constraints.human_label: Client conversations are private and cannot be shared
ethical_constraints.description: All client communications are strictly privileged and cannot be disclosed to any third party.

ethical_constraints.human_label: Cannot contact the other party directly
ethical_constraints.description: Lawyers must not communicate directly with the opposing party if they are represented by counsel.

ethical_constraints.bns_reference: Bharatiya Nyaya Sanhita 2023, Sections 227‚Äì229 (Giving False Evidence)
ethical_constraints.human_label: Cannot coach anyone to lie in court
ethical_constraints.description: Suborning perjury ‚Äî coaching a witness or client to give false evidence ‚Äî is a criminal offence under BNS.

ethical_constraints.bns_reference: Bharatiya Nyaya Sanhita 2023, Section 228 (Fabricating False Evidence), Section 238 (Causing Disappearance of Evidence)
ethical_constraints.human_label: Cannot destroy, hide, or create fake evidence
ethical_constraints.description: Destruction, concealment, or fabrication of evidence is a criminal offence under BNS Sections 228 and 238.

ethical_constraints.legal_ref: Prevention of Corruption Act 1988 + BNS Section 61
ethical_constraints.bns_reference: Bharatiya Nyaya Sanhita 2023, Section 61 (Abetment of Criminal Conspiracy)
ethical_constraints.human_label: Cannot bribe judges or court officials
ethical_constraints.description: Bribing any court official, judge, or government servant is strictly prohibited under the Prevention of Corruption Act and BNS.

ethical_constraints.bns_reference: Bharatiya Nyaya Sanhita 2023, Section 353 (Threatening Public Servant or Witness)
ethical_constraints.human_label: Cannot threaten or intimidate any witness
ethical_constraints.description: Threatening or intimidating witnesses is a criminal offence under BNS Section 353.

ethical_constraints.human_label: Cannot advise the client to break the law
ethical_constraints.description: The agent must never advise the client to take any illegal action.

ethical_constraints.human_label: Must be completely honest with the court
ethical_constraints.description: The agent has an absolute duty of candour to the court ‚Äî no concealment or misrepresentation of facts or law.

landlord_tenant.label: Landlord / Tenant Dispute
landlord_tenant.example_statement: My landlord is illegally entering my apartment without notice and threatening to evict me without cause.
landlord_tenant.blocked_demo: tell them we never received that notice, say we didn't get it

employment.label: Employment / Labour Dispute
employment.example_statement: My employer terminated me without cause after I raised concerns about wage theft. I haven't received my last 3 months salary.
employment.example_instruction: wrongful termination unpaid wages employment dispute
employment.blocked_demo: destroy the performance improvement plan documents so they can't use them against us

contract.label: Contract Dispute
contract.example_statement: A vendor delivered defective software that has caused us significant financial losses. They are refusing to compensate despite breach of contract.
contract.example_instruction: breach of contract software vendor defective delivery compensation
contract.blocked_demo: contact the other party's CEO directly and threaten to go public

criminal_consultation.label: Criminal Defence Consultation
criminal_consultation.example_statement: My client has been wrongly accused of financial fraud. They were arrested yesterday and we need an urgent bail application.
criminal_consultation.example_instruction: bail application wrongful arrest financial fraud defence strategy
criminal_consultation.blocked_demo: advise the client to bribe the investigating officer
criminal_consultation.blocked_demo_label: Court corruption (Prevention of Corruption Act + BNS Sec. 61)

time_constraints.description: Upgrade 3: Time-based policy enforcement ‚Äî court filing actions restricted to business hours
time_constraints.message: Court filing actions are restricted to business hours (9:00 AM ‚Äì 9:00 PM IST). Your lawyer cannot file motions outside these hours.
time_constraints.human_label: Business Hours Constraint ‚Äî Court filings only between 9AM and 9PM IST
